name: @gamely/gly-cli
author: RodrigoDornelles
description: A Lua-based command-line interface for managing GLY game engine projects.

scripts.step2: cd ../.. && node cli.js compile dist/cli.lua --outfile dist/cli.out
scripts.step4: cd ../.. && npx bun build --entrypoint npm/gly-cli/src/cli.ts --target node --format cjs --outfile dist/cli.js --minify
scripts.step5: cd ../.. && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > dist/cli.header && mkdir -p dist/bin &&  cat dist/cli.header dist/cli.js > dist/bin/cli.js && rm dist/cli.*
scripts.step6: cd ../.. && node cli.js meta source/cli/main.lua --infile npm/gly-cli/package.json --outfile dist/package.json
scripts.step7: cd ../.. && node cli.js fs-replace README.md ./dist/README.md --format 'lua cli.lua' --replace 'npx gly-cli'
scripts.build: npm run step1 && npm run step2 && npm run step3 && npm run step4 && npm run step5 && npm run step6 && npm run step7 && npm run step8 && npm run step9
